title: Pets
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR20L
description: Readers will love seeing their favorite pets, from bunnies to turtles, in this simple early reader. One-to-one picture correspondence, simple text, and familiar creatures will help students recognize the printed words for the animals they find in their homes.
meta: bird, bunny, cat, dog, goldfish, hamster, mouse, turtle
Make, revise, and confirm logical predictions to understand text
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /p/ sound
